p: In line with the first expectation, we found a loss of FDis in the lowlands (500 m) (Fig. 2). This was largely consistent across dispersal scenarios and emission scenarios (RCP 6.0 and RCP 8.5) (Figs. 2 and S2, 500 m). The loss of FDis was due to a projected decrease in occurrence probabilities of species at the margins of the functional trait space (Figs. 3 and S3–5, 500 m).
